entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 10:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers near noon except a few flurries over higher terrain. Clearing this afternoon. Snow level 700 metres. Fog dissipating this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight except a few flurries over higher terrain. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers except a few flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Snow level rising to 1100 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
